hero-description: Engineering, Consulting and International Development Services for Energy, Robotics and Cybersecurity sectors
tech-description: Innovative technological developments in Energy, Robotics, Advanced Electronics, Drones and Cybersecurity
services-description: Inspection, training, homologation and specialized consulting for the metal and carbon fiber and glass fiber composites industry
business-description: International expansion, strategic outsourcing and technological collaboration
business-subtitle: Comprehensive strategies for international expansion and operational optimization
services-page-subtitle: High quality inspection, homologation, training and consulting
inspection-renewable-desc: Inspection of hydraulic generators, wind turbines and solar power plants. Advanced NDT techniques and infrared thermography.
inspection-civil-desc: Inspection of metal components and structures using ultrasound, liquid penetrant and magnetic particle techniques.
inspection-industrial-desc: Inspection of petrochemical and nuclear facilities with advanced NDT techniques. Exhaustive quality control and certification.
homologation-inspectors-desc: Certification and qualification programs for inspectors according to international standards. Theoretical and practical training.
homologation-welders-desc: Certification of welders according to international codes. Practical tests and technical competence evaluation.
homologation-processes-desc: Qualification of welding procedures (WPS/PQR). Destructive and non-destructive tests according to applicable standards.
training-composites-desc: Specialized training in composite materials manufacturing techniques. Manual lamination, infusion and autoclave.
training-welding-desc: Welding courses in different processes: TIG, MIG/MAG, submerged arc. Theoretical and practical training with certification.
training-additive-desc: Industrial 3D printing courses. FDM, SLA, SLS technologies and applications in engineering and rapid prototyping.
consulting-quality-desc: Consulting for implementation and certification of ISO 9001 quality management systems. Internal audits and training.
consulting-optimization-desc: Analysis and improvement of production processes. Implementation of Lean and Six Sigma methodologies to increase efficiency.
contact-description: Let's talk about how we can help you transform your project into reality.
tech-page-subtitle: Sustainable energies and advanced electronics for a cleaner future
hydrogen-intro: Development of green hydrogen solutions as the energy vector of the future. H2 production, storage and distribution projects for industrial decarbonization.
wind-intro: Consulting and development of onshore and offshore wind farms. Feasibility analysis, facility design and energy production optimization.
solar-intro: High efficiency solar photovoltaic installations for distributed generation and utility-scale plants. Integration with storage systems.
biomass-intro: Energy recovery from organic waste and forest biomass. Cogeneration plants and sustainable biofuel production.
robotics-intro: Robotic systems for industrial automation, inspection and maintenance. AI and machine vision integration.
cybersecurity-intro: Protection of critical infrastructures and industrial systems. Security audits and incident response plans.
automation-intro: Control and automation systems for Industry 4.0. IoT integration, digital twins and real-time monitoring.
mobility-intro: Autonomous vehicles, fleet management systems and smart electric mobility solutions.
contact-page-subtitle: Contact our team. We respond within 24 hours.
mission-page-subtitle: The principles that guide our work and our relationship with clients and partners
mission-description: Transform innovative ideas into real technological solutions, connecting European companies with global markets through specialized consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics and professional technical services. We are committed to delivering measurable results and creating lasting partnerships with our clients.
vision-description: To be the leading technological bridge between Europe and Asia, driving transformation towards a sustainable future through technological innovation and international collaboration. We envision a world where technology serves both business success and environmental responsibility, creating lasting value for our clients, partners and the communities we serve.
values-subtitle: Six fundamental principles that define our organizational culture and commitment
value-innovation-desc: We constantly seek new solutions and technologies that create real value for our clients. Innovation drives us to challenge the status quo and explore emerging opportunities in sustainable energy and advanced technologies.
value-quality-desc: We are committed to technical excellence and compliance with the highest international standards. Every project is delivered with precision, attention to detail and a commitment to exceeding expectations.
value-sustainability-desc: We prioritize projects that contribute to a cleaner, more sustainable future for future generations. Environmental responsibility is integrated into every decision and solution we develop.
value-collaboration-desc: We believe in the power of strategic alliances and bidirectional knowledge transfer. Success is built through partnerships where all parties contribute and grow together.
business-analysis-desc: In-depth research of Asian and European markets to identify key opportunities. We conduct feasibility and competition studies to minimize risks in your international expansion.
business-outsourcing-desc: Comprehensive management of outsourced teams and processes. We connect your company with verified technical partners to optimize operational costs without compromising quality standards.
business-collaboration-desc: Facilitation of strategic alliances and joint ventures. We create bridges for co-development of products and R&D transfer between leading companies in Europe and Asia.
business-implantation-desc: Complete support for physical establishment at destination. From location selection for production plants to legal and administrative management of new subsidiaries.
